%md 
![Chicago Data Portal](https://data.cityofchicago.org/api/assets/73F1665C-0FE6-4183-8AD1-E91DB8EFAFA4?7CB02402-8E06-48B0-8C9A-3890182D58C7.png "Chicago Data Portal")
### An statistical analysis of crime in Chicago

This notebook seeks to analyze the reported incidents of crime that have occurred in **Chicago**

The dataset were obtained from the [Chicago city data website](https://data.cityofchicago.org/) 

#### The Objective
The object is to blablabla

msg.data:
An statistical analysis of crime in Chicago

This notebook seeks to analyze the reported incidents of crime that have occurred in Chicago

The dataset were obtained from the Chicago city data website

The Objective

The object is to blablabla

paragraphs.text:
%sh 
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /user/cloudera/rawdata/crime/chicago

wget -O crime_chicago.csv https://data.cityofchicago.org/api/views/ijzp-q8t2/rows.csv?accessType=DOWNLOAD 

hdfs dfs -moveFromLocal crime_chicago.csv /user/cloudera/rawdata/crime/chicago

%md

### For each year and district, the % of homicide that lead to an arrest.

msg.data: For each year and district, the % of homicide that lead to an arrest.

paragraphs.text:
%md
### See the trend of specific kind of crimes though the years

msg.data: See the trend of specific kind of crimes though the years

paragraphs.text:
%hive
select year, primary_type, count(1) as knt from chicago_crime_raw where primary_type IN (${checkbox:Crime='THEFT'|'ROBBERY'|'ASSAULT','THEFT'|'ROBBERY'|'ASSAULT'|'MOTOR VEHICLE THEFT'|'CRIMINAL DAMAGE'|'OTHER OFFENSE'|'CRIMINAL TRESPASS'|'DECEPTIVE PRACTICE'|'BATTERY'|'CRIM SEXUAL ASSAULT'}) group by year, primary_type;

paragraphs.text:
%md
### Top 3 day of the week most crime are committed for each year

msg.data: Top 3 day of the week most crime are committed for each year

paragraphs.text:
%spark

import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._

val dayofweek = udf((dt: String) => {
    if (dt == null) null
    else {
        val sdf1 = new SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss a")
        val date = sdf1.parse(dt)
        val sdf2 = new SimpleDateFormat("EEEEEE")
        sdf2.format(date)
    }
})

val tableDF = sqlContext.sql("select crime_date, year, primary_type from chicago_crime_raw where year != 'Year'").
    withColumn("dayOfWeek", dayofweek(col("crime_date"))).
    select("primary_type", "dayOfWeek", "year").cache

tableDF.registerTempTable("crime")

msg.data:
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
dayofweek: org.apache.spark.sql.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,StringType,List(StringType))
tableDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [primary_type: string, dayOfWeek: string, year: string]

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql

SELECT *
FROM
  (SELECT primary_type,
          dayOfWeek,
          cnt as Number_of_occurence,
          rank() over (partition BY primary_type
                       ORDER BY cnt DESC) score
   FROM
     (SELECT primary_type,
             dayOfWeek,
             count(1) cnt
      FROM crime
      WHERE YEAR = ${year=2001,2001|2002|2003|2004|2005|2006|2007|2008|2009|2010|2011|2012|2013|2014|2015|2016|2017|2018} 
      AND primary_type = '${primary_type=THEFT,THEFT|ROBBERY|ASSAULT|MOTOR VEHICLE THEFT|CRIMINAL DAMAGE|OTHER OFFENSE|CRIMINAL TRESPASS|DECEPTIVE PRACTICE|BATTERY|CRIM SEXUAL ASSAULT|PROSTITUTION}'
      GROUP BY primary_type,
               dayOfWeek) AS v) AS w
WHERE score <= 3
